mapper.insert: insert into tSMGStoreLocation ( openId, unionId, province, city, location, storeId, storeName, longitude, latitude, limitNumber,area) values ( #{openId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{storeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{storeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{longitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{latitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{limitNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update tSMGStoreLocation set openId = #{openId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, unionId = #{unionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, location = #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, longitude = #{longitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, latitude = #{latitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, limitNumber = #{limitNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, updateTime = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, area=#{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where lineId = #{lineId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select TOP 1 lineId, openId, unionId, province, city, location, A.storeId, storeName, longitude, latitude, limitNumber, createTime, updateTime,area,posName, posid from tSMGStoreLocation A LEFT JOIN tSMGPosConfiguration B ON A.storeId=B.storeId where A.storeId = #{storeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
